name: Sync ActiveCampaign analytics to Google Sheets
description:
Automatically sync your ActiveCampaign analytics to Google Sheets to enhance your marketing campaigns. This template transfers key performance metrics every Friday, allowing you to access fresh insights at the start of each week. Optimize your strategies with up-to-date data, reduce manual tasks, and improve decision-making efficiency. Ideal for teams looking for a streamlined approach to campaign tracking and analysis.
The scenario runs every Friday (feel free to change the schedule if needed). You can change this in the scheduling settings by clicking the clock icon.
